1111001111010010 0011111110111100 0 -> sum: 0011001110001110, cout: 1
0101110100100001 0010110010110010 0 -> sum: 1000100111010011, cout: 0
1000011001101111 0011001100011000 1 -> sum: 1011100110001000, cout: 0
1101000100101011 1100010000000010 1 -> sum: 1001010100101110, cout: 1
0001110010101100 1101110110100101 1 -> sum: 1111101001010010, cout: 0
1101101001000111 1010000110111010 1 -> sum: 0111110000000010, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
